alert.note: Alert for Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rio Blanco County through 230 PM MDT... At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 29 miles south of Rangely, or 46 miles northwest of Grand Junction, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Rio Blanco County. This includes Colorado 139 between mile markers 37 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
